name: Exemption for sustainable affordable developments Note Chapter heading amended by L 1975, c 185, 2(1). Cross References
text: Exemption for sustainable affordable developments.  Notwithstanding any other law to the contrary, no lessee under a sustainable affordable lease as defined in section 516-1 and qualified under section 516-202 may exercise the rights granted to a lessee under section 519-2. [L 2005, c 197, §4]
